reviews.review: A really fun game to spend with friends or alone. Definitely recommend
УЕБАНСКАЯ РАНДОМНАЯ ХУЙНЯ КОГДА НУЖНА КАРТА ХУЙ ТЕ В РОТ А КОГДА НЕ НУЖНА СОСИ ЖОПУ В ЧЛЕН ХУЙЛО ЕБАНОЕ СУКА РОТ ЕБАЛ ЭТОЙ ИГРЫ РАЗРОБОТЧИКИ ПИДОРАСЫ

This game is pretty good if you like strategy and mindgames. Lots of different characters to play with unique skill sets. Many killers have insanely high skill caps so there is always something new to do. However, the devs are shit, balance changes take forever, and there are still loads of unpatched bugs. This is the kind of game that has potential, but the devs are too busy releasing cosmetics and bathing in cash to care about fixing the game. Right now, I don't recommend it. 

It's too late for me though, I already wasted my life on this game.

ranking games on how much i hate them:
1. Valorant
2. League
3. Dead by Daylight

I give the game a chance to test if things have gotten better optimization wise every patch. The game never gets better. For each problem they fix 15 more problems arise. This has to be one of the funnest games to play but its tainted with bugs and optimization issues. Each aspect of the game (killer and survivor) has two drastically different perspectives of how the game should be played and it honestly leaves a sour taste to deal with randoms. The developers care more about pushing DLC and getting an extra dollar in their pockets than the community. Such a shame.

I like the game, reason for the downvote is the absolutely atrocious amount of bugs ive been facing playing this game. Tonight alone, I played three or four games, which I cannot keep track of easily because most games dont finish properly. At first it crashed, then on the next startup, I got "disconnected", which magically didnt happen restarting right after, then, during the third or fourth game, I got told the anitcheat (which is atrocious) detected my gamefiles were "modified" (the game was almost over at this point), and that I needed to verify integrity on steam. I have never once opened this games installing directory folder. I wouldnt know and dont care about how to modify the files, unless that will fix my issues. Ontop of all the crashes that I get every third game since the last update, which I always report, and always seem to happen for absolutely no reason at completely random points during a game, this games anticheat will literally scan your entire game-folder WHILE playing the game, which is the reason I got disconnected in the middle of it with a false positive. If you have an SSD all of this is little enough of a problem, unfortunately, as backwater-washed up HDD owner, verifying this game on every startup so I can play without any lag whatsoever will take me about 10 to 15 minutes everytime. Nevermind that this doesnt even stop hackers, which I myself havent faced, but had the pleasure of watching on Otz's Stream just a day ago. Its sad because I enjoy the time I am playing quite a lot, sure you have one of "those" games once in a while, but its no big issue to me, the regular game is very fun and most people I met were not evil-spirited. Sad that more than playing I keep restarting this piece of shit application that keeps fucking me over into 20 minute waiting times while being unable to do literally anything because my HDDs reading speed is maxed out, and god forbid if I tab out I get a 50/50 of crashing again. In alot of my reviews I keep mentioning that my setup is outdated or that the games performance is simply unacceptable. This is not the case here, the games performance on my ancient 2GB graphics, 8GB ram, 4x3.33Ghz is completely fine. It just keeps crashing and the anticheat is attempting to read novels while my harddrive is illiterate. Its Sad, very sad. I hope with all my bugreports you can figure out how to improve this, so that I can finally play without the constant anxiety of whether or not im gonna make it to the endscreen. Im still gonna attempt to play this, because I genuinely love the game, just know that for me it doesnt come easy, seeing the endscreen I mean, and thats probably the most horrible thing you can do to your players. Please fix so others dont have to share this experience.

This game is pretty enjoyable overall. There are some aspects that can make it not as fun, but overall both Killer and Survivor gameplay are fun. I certainly recommend both, as it helps you get into the mindset of the otherside, and it can be fun to experience both sides too. There's certainly been a lot of issues in the past, and there are still some now, but I think the game is a lot better than it used to be overall. All I ask is for cross-progression on console (PS4/PS5 and XBox One/ Series S/X). I really want to play more on here, but I'd rather not completely restart on every character, and I also don't want to spend another $60+ to get all the dlc I've bought on console.
i shart and piss when the killer comes after me so very effective i guess
as a horror buff i love the chance to play as the protagonist of my favourite movies and playing as a survivor you get to feel the tension of the victims as they face classic killers from the genre

So I played this like a year ago during a free week, and I absolutely hated it. I was so salty I killed every snail in a 5 mile radius. That said, I've come back to the game and have been playing with friends and it's a complete 180. The first few blood web levels royally suck cause you really can't do anything, but once you get your 2nd perk you kind of have a feel for the game and it's less of a tilter. Be warned though: early on you'll feel like the killers move twice as fast and the skill checks are insane. You swap, and you'll feel like the survivors are at every generator at once. You'll get mad AF. Just relax, hang out, slap people with weapons or go on a merry chase. 

The fact that the game keeps adding new characters is a huge draw as well, but wait till dlc goes on sale or you'll spend a ton.
"I think we've done a pretty good job, so far." It's a fun and exciting game, for the most part the community is great.

Концепция игры действительно интересная и необычная. Но баланс слишком сильно перекошен в сторону маньяка. Да, может быть про игроки часто спасаются и на их скиле все вполне балансно, НО! Я обычный ракал, который отыграл 2 вечера в премейде. И за эти 2 вечера мой винрейт - 0%. Ноль, Карл! Да, можно кидать в меня помидорами и считать лоускилом, так и есть в этой игре. Но, то ли подбор по скилу отсутствует, то ли реально баланс появляется только на про уровне, но за несколько десятков игр, нам так и не удалось спастись. Почему зайдя в мобу или сетевой шутан, тебя практически всегда кидает к игрокам твоего уровня, и твои поражения чередуются с победами. Но только не в Dead by Deadlight. Здесь против вас, пати обычных нубасов, будет кидать лютого чела, который не даст вам починить даже одного генератора.

Für mich persönlich, ist das Spiel ganz gut. Trotz der negativen Kommentare und Erzählungen über das Spiel, von denen sich die meisten eh an die "toxische" Community richten, lohnt es sich. Die Leute erzählen viel wenn der Tag lang ist und das meiste davon ist nicht wahr. Ich bin in meinen stolzen drei Spielstunden (Achtung, Ironie) noch nie auf irgendwelche blöden Mates oder weiß Gott was für Leute gestoßen. Es lief immer alles friedlich, bis auf, dass einige Mates absichtlich nicht zur Rettung gekommen sind aber wer hat gesagt, dass sie das müssen? Niemand. Daher verstehe ich die ganzen Beschwerden nicht. Die Grafik geht total in Ordnung, dafür dass das Spiel mittlerweile schon stolze fünf Jahre auf dem Buckel hat. Wobei man anmerken muss, dass 2015-2016 wirklich die hoch Zeit für Games war. Das Gameplay wird manchmal langweilig und die Skill Checks nerven tierisch aber was ist ein gutes Game ohne irgendwelche nervigen Aspekte? Daraus kann ich eigentlich nur schließen, dass das Spiel bis jetzt jegliche Erwartungen sogar übertroffen hat (es wurde mir bei jedem Kaufversuch nicht nur ausgeredet, sondern auch schlecht geredet). Ich bereue es keineswegs, mir das Spiel + DLCs (Hellraiser, Spark of madness, Silent Hill und Ghostface) gekauft zu haben. Dennoch lege ich es wirklich jedem ans Herz, dieses Spiel nur bei einer Rabattaktion zu kaufen, denn 19,99 Euro allein für das Basegame auszugeben, finde ich etwas zu overpriced. Kauft es euch lieber für 9,99 und dann direkt einige DLCs dazu, wobei ich wirklich Spark of madness empfehle, denn der Survivor hat einen Perk, bei dem der Killer den Standort des Generators nicht bekommt, sollte man den SKill Check vermasseln. Das hilft wirklich sehr, wenn man erst neu dazu kommen will und sich erstmal "einspielen" möchte. Am Anfang sollte man einfach nicht aufgeben, auch wenn es einen frustriert, dass man keine Matches gewinnt - man sollte das nicht als sein main subjective nehmen. Lieber Spaß am Spiel als irgendwelche Erfolge! Der Rest kommt schon irgendwann, auch wenn es ein paar hundert Stunden dauern kann...

Tenho 200 horas de jogo, isso na steam. Tenho quase 1000 horas no console, posso dizer que o Dead By Daylight é um jogo único do gênero, ou melhor quase único (Friday the 13th The game). O objetivo de DBD é bem simples são quatro sobreviventes que precisam fazer 5 geradores, no meio fica um assassino te perseguindo, é o básico do jogo, tem algumas coisas que você como sobrevivente pode fazer que não é obrigatório, como, abrir baú, tirar totem (hex), zoar com o killer, entre outras coisas. Bom como apresentado acima é um jogo bem simples, sendo muito criativo, porém tem algumas coisas que deixa o jogo "ruim" o primeiro é a resolução do jogo, ela não é travada, ou seja, se você colocar 4:3 e jogar contra um 16:9 você vai ter vantagem de espaço sobre o adversário, isso ajudava muito quando se jogava de killer. Outro ponto que aconteceu comigo é o constante travamentos, e crash o jogo é mal otimizado, estão mais preocupados com lançar DLC com um preço absurdo e deixar o jogador na mão, e fora o servidores desse jogo maravilho, nessa ultima atualização do Pinhead os servidores estão com ping altíssimo, os cara não resetam os servidores, sei que os desenvolvedores são iniciantes mas precisam ser cobrados, o jogo vai começar a perder publico desse jeito.

Esse é só meu ponto de vista do jogo, mesmo com esses defeitos ainda vou continuar jogando. Até mais
Excelente juego, muy divertido y con una buena tematica de miedo para ser un juego online.
